patthana21.28:1.1: Nahetuṁ naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.28:2.1: Nahetuṁ namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.28:3.1: Nahetuṁ naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
